website_summaries.verdict: Despite its unique abilities, the Prynt offers too little to justify its price.
pros: The Prynt case has the allure of a modern day Polaroid instant camera
It's easy to set up and use
cons: It's too big to use as an everyday case
The photo quality is washed out
It's expensive for a toy-like device

customer_reviews.title: I don't love the quality of the photos
customer_reviews.text: I don't love the quality of the photos, I would much rather get them printed. It is a fun case and just a cool toy to have. I bought mine in Jan and it is now March and doesn't seem to work :( It says there is no more paper and I've tried everything costumer service has asked.
customer_reviews.author: yashmin

customer_reviews.title: Nice prints
customer_reviews.text: After the last software update the colors are now very good. Prints a nice 2" x 3" picture fast. Con: have to take your phone out of the case for it to fit into the printer. Be nice if they provided an adapter cable so you would not have to do that.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Quality not good, neat concept but product not well developed
customer_reviews.text: Quality not good, neat concept but product not well developed. You can only print two pictures consecutively otherwise machine over heats. Machine will fault out for no reasonable, I'll be about to print one picture then it will tell me there is a connection problem. If your looking for a poloroid I suggest staying with that company this product still needs more development.
customer_reviews.author: WolfMD

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money here, go to a RETAILER
customer_reviews.text: Started malfunctioning, jamming and stopped printing just 3 months after it was brand new. No mention of warranty when I tried looking this up-it was a gift. Waste of money and no chance to get help from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great way to print your pics!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this for my IPhone 6 and I and to replace my phone shortly after I got this with a IPhone 8, luckily it fit the IPhone 8. I love my Prynt, I can print pictures that I would otherwise have to view on my phone. You can give them away or put in a book. The pictures are about the size of a business card and you can peel of the backs to apply the pictures wherever you please. You do need to make sure your picture is of good quality to get a clear print. I love my Prynt.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Buggy software, won't hold a charge, didn't come with any instructions
customer_reviews.text: The iPhone app has a really poor interface that kept freezing and exiting. The case itself won't hold a charge. I fully charge it, take a few pics, then try to turn it off, but the indicator light next to the power button stays on, and within a day, it's dead again. It didn't come with any instructions, nor are the online instructions very useful or comprehensive, so I'm just assuming the power button works like a normal power button--click on, click off. Seems like a reasonable assumption. But this device seems to not work like that. So ultimately, it's almost completely useless. Sad. I had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Teddy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It stopped connecting to my phone and wont print anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moving Pictures
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that the memories can be “moving pictures”... literally.
customer_reviews.author: ItsSimplyDomi

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Cool gift, but cannot be used with newer phones, so it can only be used for awhile.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Seems to be a good producr

customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me on Christmas of 2016! I've only used it maybe a good 10 times! I need it now and it doesn't work!!! I haven't dropped it or nothing like it it just stopped working! I message costumer service and no luck!! Take a whole 24 to reply to one message!
customer_reviews.author: Octavio Contreras

customer_reviews.title: bleh.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, capture memories!

customer_reviews.title: It's cool when it works but not really worth all the ...

customer_reviews.title: Customer support was no help!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked once, and now won’t even charge. Tried contacting customer support, but they were USELESS! Only told me to visit FAQ. Would not recommend.

I'd use this only to share and leave memories with friends when traveling etc. some bug fixes are required for me to truly love this.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!

customer_reviews.title: The 6s works fine, and is a neat gadget
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Prynt for an iPhone 6s, and a second one for the new iPhone 7 Plus. The 6s works fine, and is a neat gadget. However, despite the writeups saying that the 6Plus adapter works for the 7Plus, it does not appear to work (due to an App/OS issue, apparently, not the hardware). I haven't received any update/feedback from Prynt yet... but apparently the app and/or firmware is not compatible with the 7Plus yet. If it were, I would give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Butler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 6 Plus! Christmas present!!

customer_reviews.title: THE QUALITY IS FINALLY HERE AND THE PRINTER REALLY WORKS EVERY TIME.  FIRST POGO PRINTER THAT HAS GOOD PRINTS.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried almost every POGO printer made and they all suck. This is the first printer that works effortlessly with the iPhone and the photos look really good. Not like barely recognizable prints... really nice prints. I LOVE THIS. I HAVE TRIED EVERY PRINTER MADE AND NONE OF THEM ARE CLOSE TO THIS ONE. THE QUALITY IS FINALLY THERE AND IT ACTUALLY WORKS. I use this mainly to show what is in a case packed with equipment so it can be repacked. I also bring it to parties where people LOVE THESE AND THEY ARE A BIG HIT AT ANY EVENT

customer_reviews.title: a really cool product that I do not regret buying

App scanner still kind of glitchy so if the main draw for you is the moving pictures, I'd either hold off or mentally prepare myself to be very patient. It works, it just takes a while. All in all, a really cool product that I do not regret buying.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Prynt Case

You just have to make sure you download the prynt app on the phone or it will not work. You actually take the photos/videos out of the app. I don't see why some people complain about the print quality. Mine look very nice and sharp, so does the video. I am looking forward to using this printer a lot in my classroom. Very happy with this product.

Honestly it's so magical you gotta use it to really understand. It gives such a rush and makes me feel like im actually reliving that moment through the little 5 second video. Honestly this has got to be the most magical thing I have ever bought.

The app is insistent that you post videos to it's page and it is hard to tell if it has done this without your permission. I bought the Prynt case to use at school in my art class and have instant prints to send home to parents. I cannot use it since the photos are so blurred and dark and I am not sure if the photos are going online. Not worth the headache or the $$.

product_meta.title: Prynt PW200003-WH Get Instant Photo Prints with The Prynt Case for iPhone 6 / 6s - White
product_meta.description:
Style:iPhone 6 / 6s| Color:White

Print instant photos from your phone! Simply attach the Prynt Case to your phone, take a photo and then create a short video. Then, print it out! When you hand your Prynt photo to a friend, they can use the Prynt app to unlock the hidden video clip, magically bringing your Prynt photo to life!



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 



$1,576,011 raised with 9,023 backers. 
Print Instant Photos from your Phone Today, we all have a powerful camera in our pocket, but most of the photos we take get lost online. Prynt makes your photos even more special by making them real again. The Prynt app lets you preview and edit your photos with free, custom filters, stickers, frames and more. Prynt photos that are long-lasting, fade and tear-resistant, and offer millions of high-res colors — plus, every photo is a sticker! You’ll never need to pay for messy ink cartridges as Prynt uses special ink-free printing technology. 

Instant Photos that Come to Life Each Prynt photo has a video saved inside it, letting you share more than just an instant. When you hand your Prynt photo to a friend, they can use the Prynt app to unlock the hidden video clip, magically bringing your Prynt photo to life. 


1.Take a photo, and Prynt will automatically capture a short video and save it inside of your photo.


2. Apply filters, frames, stickers and more, then, print it out — anytime, anywhere. 


3. Hand your Prynt photo to a friend, and they can use their Prynt app to unlock the video hidden inside, magically bringing your Prynt photo to life! 



“Found my next purchase: Prynt, a phone Case that instantly prints pictures like an old-fashioned Polaroid.” — HelloGiggles Publications from Mashable to Wired to CNN have all seen Prynt and think it’s the next big thing. Now it’s your turn to try the revolutionary technology that’s putting the fun back in photography!

About the Startup 
Describe your product in 3 words.

Incredible instant photos. 

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

We started working on Prynt during our last semester of college, inspired by the idea of combining something tangible with something digital. Turning your smartphone into a Polaroid seemed just crazy and cool enough to work. 

What makes your product special?

Prynt is the first photo-printing case for your phone, and it lets you share more than just an instant by saving a video inside of your Prynt photo. We designed Prynt in Paris with an emphasis on an authentic camera experience that’s integrates seamlessly with your phone. 

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Building a team and watching the people that have joined us develop. We are also really proud of the diversity in our team; because everyone brings a different point of view, we are able to be even more creative as a company.

Add a video to your Prynt and watch it come to life

Peel off the adhesive backing to turn any photo into a sticker!
